events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision that occurred on the highway during rush hour.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on accident type and vehicle damage details provided.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle and process the reported accident claim.
The customer was contacted and the claim was acknowledged with assurance of prompt assistance and updates.
Requested the customer to submit police report, accident photos, and vehicle repair estimates to support the claim.
The customer successfully submitted all required documents including police report and collision photos.
The internal investigation initiated to assess fault and evaluate the extent of damage to the vehicle.
Completed investigation concluded no customer fault and confirmed repair costs align with claim details.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the full repair expenses as documented in the investigation.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt claim handling.
Claim was officially approved to move forward with payment following customer agreement on settlement terms.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the approved repair costs from the auto accident claim.
The claim was officially closed after verification of payment receipt and repair work completion confirmation.
Archived all documentation and records pertaining to this auto accident claim for future reference and audit.
